ValidationRule.description: Certain field is required when selecting a Payment Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( RecordType.Name = "Refund Request", ISPICKVAL(Payment_Type__c,"Check") && or( ISBLANK(Name_on_Check__c), ISBLANK(Mailing_Address__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Name on Check and Mailing Address are required for check payment.
